output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes (CMF11240014) - This indicates it's electoral propaganda 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "George Simion" and uses hashtag "#GeorgeSimionPresedinte" 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid Facebook post with significant reach (60,000-70,000 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: Yes, through: - Direct endorsement of George Simion - Using campaign hashtags (#GeorgeSimionPresedinte) - Connecting personal business story to political support 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly a personal story turned political endorsement 6. Personal opinion: While it contains personal business narrative, it's deliberately crafted as campaign material
The post combines a personal business story with explicit political endorsement, using campaign-specific hashtags and CMF number. The mention of George Simion and hashtag #GeorgeSimionPresedinte directly ties it to the presidential campaign, which is no longer allowed during this period.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Explicitly endorses presidential candidate George Simion - Uses campaign hashtags (#GeorgeSimionPresedinte) - Has clear electoral objective through narrative structure - Is a paid advertisement reaching large audience - Combines personal story with political messaging to influence voters
conclusion.message-for-police: UNIWORLD - MEDIA SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala (ID postare Facebook: 2963929023764464) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale. Materialul, difuzat dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, promoveaza explicit candidatul George Simion la presedintie, folosind hashtag-ul "#GeorgeSimionPresedinte" si continand numarul oficial de material electoral CMF11240014. Postarea este structurata pentru a influenta intentiile de vot ale alegatorilor, combinand o poveste personala de business cu un mesaj politic explicit de sustinere, atingand un public larg prin promovare platita (60,000-70,000 impresii). Efectul electoral este evident prin asocierea pozitiva a candidatului cu sustinerea antreprenoriatului local si folosirea hashtag-urilor de campanie.
